turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Yes? Peter? I need you to order a Starbucks Capuccino, can you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok if I can, a Capuccino, do you need me to ask for something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I also want an American coffee for my niece who is visiting today, can you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, I ask for it right away

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How is the order ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: If this list is already paid, it was $ 12.30 for the two drinks

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A little expensive, but it's worth it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, is this address yours correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: These, TN.38139

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmmmm ... if they are, thanks for the help Peter

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, and what about your niece?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: She's fine, she's had a good time today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How good, what did you do with her?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We play video games for a while and we also draw and walk around the park

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh that's good

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and how was your day?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pretty good too, buy the new DEAD RED REDEMPTION

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, good, goodbye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye
